DOC.brief_summary: A study to assess the safety and efficacy of SU11248 in patients with gastrointestinal stromal tumor (GIST) whose disease has failed imatinib therapy or who were intolerant to imatinib treatment.
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Assess The Safety And Efficacy Of SU11248 In Patients With Gastrointestinal Stromal Tumor(GIST)
DOC.criteria: Key Histologicallyproven diagnosis of malignant GIST not amenable to surgery, radiation or combined modality treatment with curative intent Failed Gleevec treatment or intolerant to Gleevec therapy Key Treatment with any chemotherapy, chemoembolization therapy, immunotherapy, or investigational agent since the last dose of Gleevec
